endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all registered IT equipment.
Add a new IT equipment record to the inventory.
Retrieve details of specified IT equipment by ID.
Update the details of a specific IT equipment record.
Remove a specific IT equipment record from the inventory.
Retrieve the list of all registered software information.
Add a new software record to the inventory.
Generate compliance reports based on current inventory data.
Provide analytical statistics regarding IT inventory usage.
Access the real-time asset tracking data integrated with the system.
